title: Migrant apprehensions at southern border hit lowest point in 2 years
description: Migrant apprehensions along the southwest border last month hit the lowest level since February 2021.

title: Safety investigators subpoena pilots over close call at JFK
description: Safety investigators say they have issued subpoenas for pilots of an American Airlines plane involved in a close call at New York's Kennedy Airport last month

title: What to know about norovirus as it spreads across the US
description: Norovirus, a highly contagious disease, is spreading across the United States. Here's everything you need to know about the virus.

title: 21 states, DC ask judge to keep abortion pill on the US market
description: Twenty-two states are asking a Texas judge not to revoke federal approval of the abortion pill, arguing that doing so would be a "dangerous attack" on public health.

title: US shoots down 'high-altitude object' over Alaska, White House says
description: The U.S. has shot down what was called a "high-altitude object" over Alaska, the White House Friday.

title: Florida Senate approves bill to give DeSantis control of Disney special district
description: The Florida Senate voted on HB 9B during a special legislative session that would give Gov. Ron DeSantis the ability to appoint a board to run Disney's special district.

title: 1 dead after stabbing at high school
description: One person has died following a stabbing at Harding High School in Saint Paul, Minnesota, according to local police.

title: White House says no Biden interview prior to Super Bowl
description: The annual presidential interview during the Super Bowl pregame show apparently won't be happening this year

title: Friend who reported missing mother arrested for her murder: DA
description: The "supposed friend" of Jennifer Brown, who was found dead two weeks after he reported her missing, has now been arrested for her murder, Pennsylvania authorities said.

title: Judge rejects bid to nullify Boeing deal over Max crashes
description: A federal judge is rejecting a move to consider criminal prosecution for Boeing over the 737 Max jet

title: Texas Gov. Greg Abbott says diversity efforts 'illegal,' state agencies should stop
description: The memo, from Texas Gov. Greg Abbott's office, said diversity efforts in hiring "proactively encourage discrimination."

title: FBI searches Mike Pence's Indiana home in documents probe
description: The FBI is conducting a consensual search of former Vice President Mike Pence's home in Indiana Friday.

title: US test launches unarmed intercontinental ballistic missile
description: The Air Force said it was routine and "not the result of current world events."

title: Israeli police: 2 killed, 5 wounded in Jerusalem car-ramming
description: Israeli police say a suspected assailant rammed his car into several pedestrians in east Jerusalem, killing two people, including a six-year-old, and injuring five others before being shot and killed

title: Indian gov't withdraws appeal to hug cows on Valentine's Day
description: India’s government has withdrawn its earlier appeal to citizens to mark Valentine’s Day next week not as a celebration of romance but as “Cow Hug Day” to better promote Hindu values

title: Driver arrested after crash through fence at Texas Capitol
description: Authorities say a driver has been arrested after an SUV crashed through a fence at the Texas State Capitol

title: WATCH:  Kim Jong Un's daughter takes center stage at military parade
description: The North Korean leader's daughter clasped her father's face as missiles rolled past.

title: Damar Hamlin calls trainer the 'savior of my life' in new interview
description: Watch the Michael Strahan interview with Damar Hamlin on Monday at 7 a.m ET on "Good Morning America."

title: Biden, Lula to put focus on democracy, climate during visit
description: Biden is welcoming Brazilian President Lula to the White House.

title: District attorney to review prior cases of ex-cops charged in Tyre Nichols' death
description: The Shelby County District Attorney's Office announced that it will review all prior cases of the five former Memphis police officers charged in Tyre Nichols' death.

title: Suspect arrested in death of kindergarten teacher found in shallow grave
description: A suspect has been arrested over the death of a beloved kindergarten teacher whose body was found in a shallow grave earlier this week.

title: 'It just rang': In crises, US-China hotline goes unanswered
description: China refused a call from the U.S. Defense Secretary.

title: Moldovan prime minister resigns, government collapses
description: Moldova’s government collapsed Friday as pro-Western Prime Minister Natalia Gavrilita resigned, adding to a series of crises that have gripped the small nation since Russia invaded its neighbor, Ukraine

title: Texas AG launches probe of Home Title Lock ads tied to right-wing celebrities
description: Texas authorities are investigating the marketing claims of Home Title Lock, the anti-fraud service promoted by Rudy Giuliani and other right-wing personalities.

title: South African rugby player killed by Hawaii police had CTE
description: An autopsy report says Honolulu police fatally shot a 29-year-old South African man who had a degenerative brain disease often found in American football stars subjected to repeated head trauma

title: Suspect at large after officer-involved shooting in Maryland, police say
description: A suspect is at large after a police officer was "seriously injured" in a shooting earlier Thursday, the Baltimore County Police Department said.

title: Santos, already fundraising for 2024, is asked by FEC if he's running for reelection
description: The FEC is asking embattled Rep. George Santos to clarify if he's running again in 2024, after his fundraising triggered a requirement that he declare a 2024 campaign.

title: Yahoo to lay off 20% of its workforce by the end of the year
description: Yahoo will lay off 20% of its workforce by the end of the year, including 1,000 employees this week, as part of a restructuring of its ad tech division, the company said.
